ing: 1 (12 ounce) jar roasted red bell peppers, drained
1 (7.2 ounce) package Original Snack FactoryÂ® Pretzel CrispsÂ®
des: "Classic ingredients for romesco sauce--roasted bell peppers, garlic, almonds, parsley, paprika--make an amazing dip for Snack FactoryÂ® Pretzel CrispsÂ®."
ins:
Combine roasted peppers, almonds, parsley, olive oil, vinegar, garlic, paprika, salt, and pepper in a food processor. Blend until smooth.
Serve with Snack Factory(R) Original Pretzel Crisps(R).
